channel.title: Devolution v7 Help Needed- Trade Doesn't Work!
channel.description:
Hello, I have been editing the Devolution source for a couple of days now, so today I logged in two accounts and tried testing the "Trade with" and "Duel" right click options, I have tried everything, but nothing happens when I press them.
I have seen problems around the forum but can't seem to find an answer, and I don't want to leave my hours work go to waste, so if there is any help in fixing this out there, please help me, all help is appreciated, thanks.

item.title: Devolution v7 Help Needed- Trade Doesn't Work!
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Realm Blood Realm
item.description:
@Blood_Realm wrote:

You helped me alot, thank you very much.

Read full topic
item.source: Devolution v7 Help Needed- Trade Doesn't Work!

item.title: Devolution v7 Help Needed- Trade Doesn't Work!
item.dc:creator: @Delta2 Delta_
item.description:
@Delta2 wrote:

You can’t trade from your connecting IP. Look at the trading and dueling method, simply remove the
if (other.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom)) {
bit.

Read full topic
item.source: Devolution v7 Help Needed- Trade Doesn't Work!
